title: (x) Thank You connected script - Shelley Allegro {Jan E}
content:
I think it might be a free font, but I need to recreate something with it.  
(those are hands if you're wondering)

Many thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020090721im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3883.jpg)
author: myoung

comments.content: This sample proves why one should never track a connected script. :^/
